message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love. I'm offering it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $130 is still a little low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $135. That seems fair, considering the value of the product to you.
I understand your concerns, but $135 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $132. Can you meet me at that price?
